member.summary: After save operation on JSON master happens, send it to server

member.name: T:PepperDash.Core.Device
member.summary: The core event and status-bearing class that most if not all device and connectors can derive from.

member.name: M:PepperDash.Core.Device.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Base constructor for all Devices.

member.name: M:PepperDash.Core.Device.Activate
member.summary: Gets this device ready to be used in the system. Runs any added pre-activation items, and all post-activation at end. Classes needing additional logic to run should override CustomActivate()

member.name: M:PepperDash.Core.Device.CustomActivate
member.summary: Called in between Pre and PostActivationActions when Activate() is called. Override to provide addtitional setup when calling activation. Overriding classes do not need to call base.CustomActivate()

member.name: M:PepperDash.Core.Device.Deactivate
member.summary: Call to deactivate device - unlink events, etc. Overriding classes do not need to call base.Deactivate()

member.name: M:PepperDash.Core.Device.OnFalse(System.Object,System.Action)
member.summary: Helper method to check object for bool value false and fire an Action method
member.param: Should be of type bool, others will be ignored
Action to be run when o is false

member.name: E:PepperDash.Core.GenericSecureTcpIpServer.ServerClientReadyForCommunications
member.summary: For a server with a pre shared key, this will fire after the communication is established and the key exchange is complete. If no shared key, this will fire after connection is successful. Use this event to know when the client is ready for communication to avoid stepping on shared key.

member.summary: S+ helper for requires shared key bool

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.GenericSecureTcpIpServer.SharedKey
member.summary: SharedKey is sent for varification to the server. Shared key can be any text (255 char limit in SIMPL+ Module), but must match the Shared Key on the Server module. If SharedKey changes while server is listening or clients are connected, disconnect and stop listening will be called

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.GenericSecureTcpIpServer.HeartbeatRequired
member.summary: Heartbeat Required bool sets whether server disconnects client if heartbeat is not received

member.summary: S+ Helper for Heartbeat Required

member.summary: Milliseconds before server expects another heartbeat. Set by property HeartbeatRequiredIntervalInSeconds which is driven from S+

member.summary: Simpl+ Heartbeat Analog value in seconds

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.GenericSecureTcpIpServer.HeartbeatStringToMatch
member.summary: String to Match for heartbeat. If null or empty any string will reset heartbeat timer

member.summary: Defaults to 2000

member.param: JPath formatted path to the desired property
